app_name: Free Fire MAX for Android - Free App Download
about_section: Free Fire MAX is an action game developed by Garena International I. The APK has been available since May 2020 . In the last 30 days, the app was downloaded about 18 million times. It's top ranked. It's rated 4.42 out of 5 stars, based on 27 million ratings. The last update of the app was on May 14, 2025 . Free Fire MAX has a content rating "High Maturity" . Free Fire MAX has an APK download size of 329.28 MB and the latest version available is 2.111.1 . Designed for Android version 5.0+ . Free Fire MAX is FREE to download.
app_description:
The 8th Anniversary is here!
[New Map: Solara]
Welcome to Solara, a vibrant summer-themed port town. With dazzling jacaranda trees and charming subtropical scenery, this map features breathtaking twin peaks and an exciting slide system, along with deep combat strategies and exploration opportunities. Whether you're weaving through the winding blossom-filled streets or enjoying romantic moments beneath the Ferris wheel, Solara offers endless possibilities!
[8th Anniversary]
The Infinity Train bound for the 8th Anniversary is about to journey across all maps, inviting every brave Survivor to join. This is more than just an adventure—it’s a grand invitation to the Infinity Ring! Compete for exclusive Infinite Items, ignite your passion, and push your limits!
[Camera System]
Our new camera system offers a variety of tools and creative options to help you easily capture stunning in-game scenes and make unique memories with friends. Capture your exclusive gaming moments!
[Free Custom Room]
All players can freely create custom rooms and battle with friends!
Free Fire MAX is designed exclusively to deliver premium gameplay experience in a Battle Royale. Enjoy a variety of exciting game modes with all Free Fire players via exclusive Firelink technology. Experience combat like never before with Ultra HD resolutions and breathtaking effects. Ambush, snipe, and survive; There is only one goal: to survive and be the last one standing.
Free Fire, Battle In Style!
[Fast-paced, deeply immersive gameplay]
50 players parachute onto a deserted island but only one will leave. Over ten minutes, players will compete for weapons and supplies and take down any survivors that stand in their way. Hide, scavenge, fight and survive - with reworked and upgraded graphics, players will be richly immersed in the Battle Royale world from start to finish. 
[Same game, better experience]
With HD graphics, enhanced special effects and smoother gameplay, Free Fire MAX provides a realistic and immersive survival experience for all Battle Royale fans.
[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]
Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad right from the start. Lead your friends to victory and be the last team standing victorious at the apex!
[Firelink technology]
With Firelink, you can login your existing Free Fire account to play Free Fire MAX without any hassle. Your progress and items are maintained across both applications in real-time. You can play all game modes with both Free Fire and Free Fire MAX  players together, no matter which application they use.
